price: تاسو ښځى پرېږدئ نارينه و ته د شهوت لپاره ورځئ، بلكې تاسو (بالكل) له حده تېرېدونكي خلك ياست.
arabic: إِنَّكُمۡ لَتَأۡتُونَ ٱلرِّجَالَ شَهۡوَةٗ مِّن دُونِ ٱلنِّسَآءِۚ بَلۡ أَنتُمۡ قَوۡمٞ مُّسۡرِفُونَ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: innakum latatūna al-rijāla shahwatan min dūni al-nisāi bal antum qawmun mus'rifūna
